profile.name: Eoghan Hulbert
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.profile:
Early career software engineer with 3+ years of professional background
         in business systems architecture and design, developing scalable
         solutions, solving complex business problems, and processes automation

about me.theme song: Kiss Me - Sixpence None The Richer

qualifications: Python, PHP, JavaScript, SQL, HTML, and CSS
Data query and manipulation using RDBMS and SQL

academic.name: Southern New Hampshire University
academic.degree: B.A. Information Technologies conc Software Development
description: Participated in 20 courses to learn full stack software development (LAMP) and business systems analysis & design
Developed SDLC best practices, project management skills, and taught myself PHP to complete my senior project
Learned core Java OOP and began exploration with JavaScript (non-requirement) for web app development

independent.name: Self-Directed Development
description: Dedicated 300+ hours to learn new skills such as API, REST and Python with Udemy and Stackskills online courses
Participated in the 100 Days of Code Challenge to expand fluency with Python, another self-taught skill
Mentor 3 peers using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Python, and dev tools such as GitHub, PyCharm, and VS Code

relevant.name: Metropolitan Life
relevant.title: Support Engineer
description:
Produced evidence-based proposals using CRM call data and root cause
    problem research to resolve 7 major issues affecting
    the online portals, including account lockouts during early COVID
    that overloaded call centers

Identified 16 issues and bugs of varying impacts with the online portals
    using browser developer tools that lead to the implementation of custom
    error codes to reduce call times, increase accuracy
    and first-call resolution scores

Coordinated the installment of a dedicated review team to maintain all
    systems and troubleshooting documentation in real-time to eliminate
    5-day SLA period and increase first-call resolution from 83%
    to 97% within the first month

relevant.name: Amica Mutual Insurance
relevant.title: Software Engineer
description:
Contributed to 17 accounting and cross-functional projects to enhance
    existing distributed systems and UIs, replace manual procedures
    using available tech, automation of tasks, and developing
    new features and systems

Led 9 mid-level agile projects from requirements gathering to delivery
    as project manager, and designed, tested, and implemented new
    systems and features as developer with the oversight of
    senior engineers

Developed data pipelines and automated procedures for monthly financial
    reporting, banking and claims reconciliations, and tuition
    reimbursement processing using SQL, MSSQL, PowerShell, MS Office,
    and VBA

Learned VBA within the first month of hire and used this skill to
    redevelop and combine 12 Access UIs and create a single scalable,
    dynamic code for all businesses within Amica for data
    transformations and formatted file outputs

Routinely monitored and scaled the distributed check writing system to
    include new features such as error handling, templates, UI
    functions, and updates to MSSQL views to reuse across connected
    systems using VBA

Maintained accounting intranet pages using HTML5 and CSS3 skills to
    design and update per request

relevant.name: Mapfre Insurance, USA
relevant.title: Collections Analyst
description:
Built complex SQL queries and data pipelines to analyze historical
    collections data in MSSQL for use in workflow analysis and procedure
    overhauls, reducing third-party expenses by 30%, increasing
    balance recovery by 16%

Participated in 3 cross-functional projects with the CI/CD team to
    develop UIs used in daily workload management, collections processing
    for all accounts, management reports, and task reporting

Eliminated ~18 hours a week in wasted research effort using billing
    data to define identifiers for policies not pursued by collections and
    adjusting the MS Access SQL queries to omit them when
    pulling in new accounts

relevant.name: MEDIX
relevant.title: Support Engineer
description:
3-month contract providing help desk support for CVS store
    locations with hardware and software troubleshooting to
    maintain business operations

fun facts: Currently learning Irish Gaelic and Welsh
Taught myself how to play guitar when I was 13
